Aloha_En.mp4.title: Aloha_En.mp4
Aloha_En.mp4.transcription: The only one who trusts me The only thing I've been dreaming of Is to be in love with you to the end The reality is me The dumpling anymore Is alright if you're still here Don't worry, I'll believe In some way, I'll believe I will never forget this moment And your smile I'll believe when you are in my embrace You're the eternal source Surviving my life Cause your love is so sweet You are my everything This was a more than just we're nothing I'm not going to change Yes, I will never change And I will always watch over you You're light in my life You're the one in my life Even when I may lose everything I will never regret Then keep on loving you You're the only one in my heart I promise to love no one but you To the day I close my eyes you let go Any time that I see you It might be the last time that makes you perfect I promise to love no one but you To the day I close my eyes you let go It might be the last time that makes you perfect To me Promise me I'll believe When it's cold I'll believe And I can be the one to protect you Cause your smile I'll believe When you are in my embrace You're the eternal source Surviving my life Cause your love is so sweet You are my everything There were some more than just we're nothing I'm not going to change Yes, I will never change And I will always watch over you You're light in my life You're the one in my life Even when I may lose everything I will never regret Then keep on loving you You're the only one in my heart You light up my life You're the one in my life Even when I may lose everything I will never regret Then keep on loving you You're the only one in my heart All I ever want is your love

DailyRoutines_Travel.mp4.title: DailyRoutines_Travel.mp4
DailyRoutines_Travel.mp4.transcription: Daily routines Hi, Mom. I'm enjoying life in New Zealand. The countryside is so beautiful. My routine is different now. I wake at 6 o'clock every morning and go for a run. At 7 o'clock, I have breakfast. The coffee in New Zealand is so good. At 8 o'clock, I go to work. I usually take the bus, but sometimes I walk. I start work at 9 o'clock. I work in my office until lunchtime. At 12 o'clock, I have lunch with my colleagues in the park. It's nice to enjoy the fresh air and chat together. At 5 o'clock, I leave work and go to the gym. I exercise until 6.15 and then go home. At 8 o'clock, I eat dinner, then relax. I normally go to bed at 11.30. See you soon, Stephen.

SmallTalk_EverydayEnglish.mp4.title: SmallTalk_EverydayEnglish.mp4
SmallTalk_EverydayEnglish.mp4.transcription: So, what's new, Mark? How is your new job going? To be honest, I can't complain. I really love the company that I am working for. My co-workers are all really friendly and helpful. They really help me feel welcome. It's a really energetic and fun atmosphere. My boss is hilarious, and he's really flexible. Really? How so? He allows me to come in when I want and make my own hours. I can also leave early if I start early. There is no real dress code either. I can wear jeans and a t-shirt if I want. I can even wear shorts in the summer. Wow! It sounds really cool. I can't stand wearing a suit every day. Which do you prefer, working late or finishing early? I prefer finishing early. I really enjoy the morning. I love getting up early and going for a run. There's nothing like watching the sunrise while drinking my morning coffee. Really? I am opposite. I love sleeping in. I am most alert in the evenings. I'm a real night owl. Well, you know what they say. The early bird catches the worm. You know, you could be right. Maybe I will try to go to bed a little earlier tonight.

CryOnMyShoulder_En.mp4.title: CryOnMyShoulder_En.mp4
CryOnMyShoulder_En.mp4.transcription: If the hero never comes to you, If you need someone you're feeling blue, If you wait for love and you're alone, If you call your friends nobody's home, You can run away but you can't hide, Throw a storm and throw a lonely night, Then I'll show you there's a destiny, The best things in life, they are free, But if you wanna cry, cry on my shoulder, If you need someone who cares for you, If you're feeling sad, your heart gets colder, Yes I'll show you what real love can do, If your sky is gray or black, let me know, There's a place in heaven where we'll go, If heaven is a million years away, Oh just call me and I'll make your day, When the nights are getting cold and blue, When the days are getting hard for you, I will always stay by your side, I promise you I'll never hide, But if you wanna cry, cry on my shoulder, If you need someone who cares for you, If you're feeling sad, your heart gets colder, Yes I'll show you what real love can do, But if you wanna cry, cry on my shoulder, If you need someone who cares for you, If you're feeling sad, your heart gets colder, Yes I'll show you what real love can do, What real love can do, What real love can do, What love can do, What love can do, What love can do,

DiCho_Vi.mp4.title: DiCho_Vi.mp4
DiCho_Vi.mp4.transcription: Chị muốn mua gì? Tôi muốn mua cam, 30 tiền 1 cân. 50.000 đạn, đắt thế. Bình thường tôi mua 40.000 thôi. Không được đâu. Cam 1 tay đáy hơn không qua, 45.000 chí nhét. Thôi tuyết rồi. Chị lên bấy cân, cho tôi 2 cân. Chị muốn tôi chọn dung hay chị tự chọn? Để tôi tự chọn. Chị có lấy thêm gì nữa không? Cho tôi thêm 2 cái bắp cải, 1 cân cá chua và 1 cân khoai tây. Tất cả hét bao nhiêu ạ chị? Chị đã tôn 1 chút. Tất cả hét 155.000. Chị có 5.000 phút nữa không? Chị có 5.000 phút nữa không? Chị có 5.000 phút nữa không? Chị có 5.000 phút nữa không? Chị có 5.000 phút nữa không? Chị có 5.000 tiền lẹ không? Tây tôi cứ 1 chút. Tôi chả đã trình 50.000. Hômigảu ơi. Cột chị singles. Chị muốn mua gì? Tôi muốn mua cam. B bao nhiêu tiền, 1 cân? 50.000 ạ Đắt thế Bình thường tôi mua 40.000 thôi Không được đâu Cám hôm nay đắt hơn hôm qua 45.000 chị nhé Thôi cũng được Chị lấy mấy cân Cho tôi 2 cân Chị muốn tôi chọn giúp Hay chị tự chọn Để tôi tự chọn Chị có lấy thêm gì nữa không? Cho tôi thêm 2 cái bắp cải 1 cân cá chua Và 1 cân khoai tây Tất cả bao nhiêu hạ chị? Đợi tôi một chút Tất cả hết 155.000 chị ạ Tôi gửi Chị có 5.000 tiền lẻ không? Đợi tôi một chút Tôi trả lại chị 50.000 Cảm ơn của chị đây

ShortVideo_EnglishForLife.mp4.title: ShortVideo_EnglishForLife.mp4
ShortVideo_EnglishForLife.mp4.transcription: My glory doesn't happen in front of a crowd. It doesn't happen in a stadium or on a stage. There are no medals handed out. It happens in the darkness of the early morning, in solitude, where I try, and I try, and I try again. With everything I have to be the best that I can possibly be, better than I was yesterday. Better than people thought I could be, better than I thought I could be. Then claim one victory that no one can ever take away from me ever. A victory that is earned every single day. A victory of determination, and will, and discipline. A victory achieved because I will not stop.

DiTaxi_Vi.mp4.title: DiTaxi_Vi.mp4
DiTaxi_Vi.mp4.transcription: Chào chị, cho tôi đến nhà cô Khi ở 519 Đường Phạm Hồng. Chào chị, chị là người nước ngoài à? Chị là người nước nào hết? Tôi là người Hàn Quốc. Chị sống ở Việt Nam lâu chưa? Tôi sống ở Việt Nam 3 năm rồi. Wow, tiếng việt của chị tốt thật đấy. Chị học tiếng việt được bao lâu rồi? Tôi học tiếng việt được 1 năm rồi. Chị có sống ở gần đây không? Không, tôi không sống ở gần đây. Đây là lần đầu tiên tôi đến đây. Đến nhà Hàn Quốc kìa rồi. Tất cả thế này bao nhiêu à? 120.000. Đây tôi hủy tiền à. Cảm ơn chị.
